content.processed:
Recommendations

Food is the cornerstone of our health.

Pay attention to a healthy and balanced diet, rich in vitamins and minerals- especially vitamins C, D, E, zinc, and selenium (always follow recommended daily doses).

Eat quality food that isn't industrially processed and do not forget about fruit and vegetables.
